name: Bloodstone
description: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

abilities.name: Bloodpact
abilities.description: Applies a basic dispel and greatly increases the passive spell lifesteal for a while.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Applies a basic dispel on the user upon cast
Increases Bloodstone's spell lifesteal against heroes to 80% and against creeps to 16%
Does not apply the buff if the caster has been affected by it in the last 30 seconds
A status buff icon on the caster shows how much time is left for it to be able to get affected by Bloodpact again
The buff duration is set upon cast and is affected by cooldown manipulation

additionalInfo: Spell lifesteal from different sources stacks additively
Multiple instances of spell lifesteal from the same source do not stack
Listed at the Base Shop, under Magical, but requires items from the Secret Shop to be assembled
